text: Expected: validation of file extension is not case-sensitive

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
the reason it is is because the pipelines are also case sensitive. those two
would have to be fixed at the same time. and franikly, image.GIF is just broken
and should be rewritten server-side to image.gif
i added a note to the js warning.
